body.p:
Please find annexed a circular
which will explain its own mission. please insert the same in
your valuable Occident with such liberal remarks and recommendation
as the Laudable enterprise deserves. For if ever a community
stood in need of encouragement and support from Influential
quarters, The Israelites of this City come in for a full share__
For like the Dry Bones in the valley of Hinom we need the spirit
of God to ressurect and revive us for Hebrew

vain is the sentinels of vigilance if the Lord Guard not
the City„ Our work was commenced under the most unfavorable
auspices for we had not only to contend with and overcome the
different proclivities and predispositions of the various members of
which our divoted little Congregation is composed each claming to
enraft their own peculiar views. Imported from beyond the big seas
upon the Ancient land marks of our Sublime faith. But void as this
place has been for years past of Religion Religious Worship and instructions
Judaism stripped of her Holy and Ancient vestiges the last trace of our
Sublime inheritance allowed to fade from the Tablets of Memory of old
and young as does the last Golden Rays of the declining Sun when
Sinking to Rest. Our utmost endeavors had to be exerted to shake off
the heavy torpor and to dispose the deep gloom which like a dismal
mist did obscure that bright and shining light received upon Sinaäs
lofty brow. When first we met to Meditate upon a mode of action
How to rescue from oblivion the tottering and smouldering pillow of

our ancient edifice we felt like Columbus when venturing out with
his devoted little ? (Crew) in 1492 upon the turbulent and
unchartered mighty Atlantic. Many have pronounced it a Bold plan. And
though not as successful as him in making the voyage in two months
yet thank God the cry is Land-A-Hoy and our devoted little bark
strugling through the foaming billows Has heard the Haven of our long
anticipated desires and cast her anchor in gentle and placid waters
where the light of Heaven reflects a benign blessing around those
gathered under the Shadow of her wide expanded sails unfurled to the
breeze. Though our means and circumstances in life have been reduced
by the casualties and ravages of war yet with the help of Kind Heaven
and the assistance of a few of our coreligionists we have been
enabled to procure the services of a Chasan and Shackel and Rented
a place of worship where old and young can assemble to Praise
Israels God. We have also a Sunday School annexed to our Congregation
for the instruction of the Children of our Holy faith and an Institution. That
has been so much needed and so long neglected. The Talented and Zealous Mrs
Charlotte. A. Sevin has been electid President Mrs Jacob Sevin Directress and
Mrs Branna Levy Vice President of the same and we are sanguine that with
the knowledge and ability these three talented Ladies are endowed with and the
success of their former Sunday School management that like the Pillar
of fire that led our ancestors through an uncultivated desert to lead
our offspring to a bright land of promise knowledge and bliss.

Awake awake Deborah awake awake the inspired song. While talking of Ladies
We take the privilege of acknowledging the very liberal and munificent donation
of two Hundred and twenty five dollars from our Brethren of Charlotte
Philadelphia and Baltimore through the kindness and untiring energy

of a highly esteemed Lady of our persuasion Mrs Elenor D Elias of
Charlotte N. C. long may she live to enjoy the blessings she so richly
deserves. Other remittances are acknowledged in the proper place. We have
formed a Constitution and By Laws upon strict orthodox principles
The following officers are elected for the ensuing year

We had the pleasure of a visit from the Nestor of American Ministers
Rev Isaak Leeser on the 10th inst and the gratification to listen
to words of wisdom and instruction from his gifted and fluent lips
and the vivid lightning flashes of his Brilliant and Prolific mind.
The meeting was well attended and the decorum and order observed
at the same showed that his instruction made a deep impression upon
the minds of his hearers and were relished
Like a spray upon Herbs, as a shower upon grass.
May kind Heaven prolong his life in his usefull career
With High regards I Have the honor to be
